titles.title: National Wildlife Refuge Management Contingency Act of 1995

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept from a State donations of services of State employees to perform hunting management functions in a National Wildlife Refuge in a period of Government budgetary shutdown.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 12/5/1995--Introduced. National Wildlife Refuge Management Contingency Act of 1995 - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to accept from any qualified State donations of State employee services to perform in a National Wildlife Refuge, in a period of Government budgetary shutdown, hunting management functions otherwise authorized to be performed by Department of the Interior personnel.
